Disclaimer.Title: Thanks for trying out Pallokala!
Disclaimer.Body: Pallokala is still in development and is missing some features and contains bugs. Please report any issues you find.

Updated.Title: Pallokala just got updated!
Updated.Body: Check out what's new in this version.

Auth.OtpSecretError: The OTP secret stored for this account didn't work. You will need to enter the OTP code from your authenticator app manually.
Auth.LoginFailed: Failed to login to the server.
Auth.UnsupportedVersionUpgrade: 2.x versions of PufferPanel are not supported. Please upgrade to 3.x.
Auth.VersionCheckFailed: Failed to check server version. Please check the server address and try again.
Auth.AccountAddFailed: Unable to add account. Please check the server address and try again.
Auth.WelcomeSubline: Add a new PufferPanel server to get started.
Auth.WelcomeNote: Note: Pallokala only works with version 3.0 and later PufferPanel servers.

Preferences.SftpDesc: The SFTP based file manager is experimental, however contains features not available in the HTTP based one. The app will fallback to the HTTP based one if the connection fails. SFTP cannot be used with OAuth2 accounts.

2FA.EnterDesc: If you provide your 2FA secret Pallokala can use it to bypass the need to use an authenticator app every time you open the app.
2FA.SaveSecretDesc: Save the 2FA secret to your device to enable logging in without a code

Files.SftpConnectionFailed: Failed to connect to SFTP. Falling back to HTTP.
Files.LogDecompressed: Log file decompressed in memory. Editing not available.
Files.UnsavedChangesBody: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
